title: Baby Temp Infrared Forehead Thermometer, Non-Contact, Touch-Free, Instant Result for Babies, Children and Adult, Indoor Outdoor, Touchless and Accurate
description: Baby Temp Infrared Forehead Thermometer, Non-contact, touch-free, Instant Result for babies, children and adult, Indoor outdoor, Touchless and accurate. Your baby can now enjoy a sound sleep while you measure his/her temperature with Baby Doppler’s non-contact instant thermometer, all in one second! Its sleek design, auto-shutoff, one-touch button, large font LCD backlight and °C/°F switchable feature makes it convenient and super simple to use. The product is cleared for sale in USA and delivers clinically tested (accurate) results. Safe, effective and suitable for users of all ages. Includes 2X AAA batteries.
